name: 2-bootstrap
description: This is a website for the fictional campsites review site NuCamp.

scripts.usemin: usemin contact.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/contact.html && usemin aboutme.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/aboutme.html && usemin index.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/index.html
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run imagemin && npm run copyfonts && npm run usemin

author: Marliyn Marquez
